    A symbol - local variable or class attribute

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The name of the symbol being evaluated. Take into account the syntax "self.sym" to specify explicitly class attributes.

      • variable

        private Variable variable
        Reference to the variable corresponding to the symbol. The variable can be:
      • an Attribute of the current class
      • a FormalParam of the current method. It can be any formal parameter, except for self.
      • a LocalDefinition. The Assignment must be inside the scope of the LocalDefinition.
